saadadb.vo.request.formator
Interface Formator

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConeSearchToFITSFormator, ConeSearchVotableFormator, FitsFormator, FITSFormator, JsonFormator, OidsVotableFormator, QueryResultFormator, SaadaqlFitsFormator, SaadaqlVotableFormator, SiapVotableFormator, SsapVotableFormator, TapAdqlJsonFormator, TapAdqlVotableFormator, VOResultFormator, VotableFormator, VOTableFormator, ZipFormator
public interface Formator

This is a simple interface with the very common services a formator must support.

Version:
06/2011 creation
Author:
laurent

setProtocolParams

void setProtocolParams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Set the map of parameter possibly used by the formator (query pos, frame....) There is no standard vocabulary for keys. The VORequest is supposed to know what the Formator needs

Parameters:
fmtParams - parameter map
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
